meanings.definition: To make use of or take advantage of
meanings.sent1: She availed herself of the opportunity to learn a new skill.
meanings.sent2: He availed the discount offered at the store.
meanings.sent3: The student availed the study group to improve his grades.
meanings.sent4: The hiker availed the map to navigate through the forest.
meanings.sent5: They availed the online resources to complete the project on time.

meanings.definition: To be of use or benefit
meanings.sent1: The umbrella availed in keeping her dry during the rain.
meanings.sent2: His advice availed them in making the right decision.
meanings.sent3: The flashlight availed in finding the lost keys in the dark.
meanings.sent4: The extra practice availed in improving her performance.
meanings.sent5: The medication availed in reducing his pain.

meanings.sent5: The mechanic availed the driver in fixing the car quickly.
